pages.text: rituals are a powerful magic practice used to have a direct effect on the world. they are cast by drawing circles and throwing in the proper ingredients.$(br)rituals need an me-providing altar nearby; the amount of me needed is always noted in the ritual's entry.$(br)every ritual has an inner and an optional outer circle drawn with different chalk, depending on the ritual.
a golden gylph always forms the center of a circle.
